sentence.Network_en: The battle had reached a crucial juncture.
What's important at this juncture is the ability of the three republics to work together.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这个关键时刻，最重要的是这3个共和国的合作能力。

sentence.Network_en: The project is situated at the juncture of the new and old urban districts.
sentence.Network_cn: 该项目位于新老城区交界处。

list.abs: 报告书开头第一句话是：“管理会计正处在关键时刻(critical juncture)”。竞争和经营条件的不稳定性加剧，促使出现许多管理会计的方 …
2012安南访华... ... at a critical stage 处于关键时期 critical juncture 关键时刻；紧要关头 impose sanctions on 对……实施制裁.
plate junction 板块结合带plate juncture 板块边界；板块结合带plate keel 平板龙骨

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'act of joining'): from Latin junctura, 'joint', from jungere 'to join'

entry.tran: 特定时刻；（尤指）当口，重要关头
entry.def: At a particular juncture means at a particular point in time, especially when it is a very important time in a process or series of events.

example.ex: What's important at this juncture is the ability of the three republics to work together...
example.tran: 在这个关键时刻，最重要的是这3个共和国的合作能力。

example.ex: We're at a critical juncture in terms of his domestic program.
example.tran: 就他的国内计划而言，我们正处于一个紧要的关口。

means.word_mean: 1. an event that occurs at a critical time;

sentences.sentence: "at such junctures he always had an impulse to leave"
"it was needed only on special occasions"

means.word_mean: 2. a crisis situation or point in time when a critical decision must be made;

sentences.sentence: "at that juncture he had no idea what to do"
"he must be made to realize that the company stands at a critical point"

means.word_mean: 3. the shape or manner in which things come together and a connection is made

auth_sentence.content: Khan, makes such a deal unlikely at this juncture.
auth_sentence.res_content: Khan, makes such a deal unlikely at this juncture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Khan, makes such a deal unlikely at this juncture.

auth_sentence.content: The effort is now approaching a critical juncture.

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps potential narrows as it approaches the juncture.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+junct结合,连接→adj.结合的, 共同的 n.与他人联合的, 同他物结合的物
dis分开+junct结合,连接→adj.分离的, 不相连的
sub下面+junct结合,连接+ive……的→下面[似乎]连着→不太肯定是否关联→虚拟的
ad增加+junct结合,连接→加上连接→附属物,附件

stems_affixes.value_cn: 与他人联合的, 同他物结合的物

con共同+junction[n.连接,接合,交叉点,枢纽站,接头,中继线]→共同连上→结合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分离, 分裂, 折断

injunct[v.命令, 吩咐,下令制止]+ion表名词→n.命令,强制令
